title: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions:
Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Saute onion and garlic, then add ground beef and cook until browned.
Stir in tomato sauce and simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve over spaghetti and top with parmesan cheese.
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with rich, savory flavors.

title: Vegetable Stir-fry
instructions:
Heat oil in a wok.
Add garlic and stir-fry vegetables until tender.
Pour soy sauce over vegetables and mix well.
Serve over rice.
description: A quick and healthy vegetable dish.

title: Pancakes
instructions:
Mix flour, baking powder, and sugar in a bowl.
Whisk in milk and egg until smooth.
Heat a pan and melt butter.
Pour batter into the pan and cook until bubbles form.
Flip and cook until golden brown.

title: Caesar Salad
instructions:
Chop romaine lettuce.
Add croutons and parmesan cheese.
Toss with Caesar dressing.
Top with grilled chicken if desired.
description: A classic Caesar salad with optional chicken.

title: Beef Tacos
instructions:
Cook ground beef with taco seasoning.
Fill taco shells with beef, lettuce, tomato, and cheese.
Top with sour cream and serve.

title: Banana Bread
instructions:
Preheat oven to 175Â°C (350Â°F).
Mash bananas in a bowl.
Mix in melted butter, sugar, and egg.
Stir in flour and baking soda.
Pour batter into a loaf pan and bake for 60 minutes.

title: Minestrone Soup
instructions:
Saute onion, carrot, and celery in a pot.
Add tomatoes, broth, and beans.
Bring to a boil, then add pasta and cook until tender.

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions:
Butter one side of each bread slice.
Place cheese between slices, buttered sides out.
Cook in a skillet until golden brown on both sides.
description: A simple yet delicious grilled cheese.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions:
Preheat oven to 175Â°C (350Â°F).
Cream butter and sugars.
Add egg and vanilla extract.
Mix in flour and fold in chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls onto a baking sheet and bake for 10 minutes.
